fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Nine Lives:** Whiskers can survive death 8 times. Each time Whiskers would be killed, they will instead be protected and revealed as the Brainless Feline, retaining all their abilities and attributes. On the ninth death, Whiskers cannot be saved and will die like any other player.
- **Confusion Aura:** Once per night, Whiskers can emit a confusing aura, targeting a player. The targeted player's abilities and messages for that night will be randomly altered, resulting in unpredictable outcomes. The effect is temporary and does not modify their role or alignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Feline Instincts:** Whiskers has superior night vision, allowing them to see the true roles of any players targeting them during the night.
- **Tuesday and Friday Feline Boost:** On Tuesdays and Fridays, Whiskers gains an additional life, increasing their total number of lives to 10. In addition, their Confusion Aura becomes stronger, affecting all players instead of a single target.
